txt.en: Defeated Khundolar at Lashkarg in the Brown Lands ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The Khundolar have swept into the Brown Lands in preparation to descend upon the Riddermark like a double-edged sword.

'Céola delays too long. We must move against the Khundolar now, [placeholder]. They have come in great force, and my people will be unable to defend against them.

'Will you help me, [placeholder]? Will you enter Lashkarg, their war-camp to the south-east, and put the fear of the Rohirrim into them?

'If so, you should leave at once.'

Khundolar Easterlings can be found at Lashkarg, south-east of Etheburg in the Brown Lands.\n\nDagbert has asked you to enter Lashkarg, war-camp of the Khundolar, and defeat the Easterling warriors there.

'Dagbert sent you to attack the Easterlings at Lashkarg? He is an idiot! We are fortunate the Khundolar have not yet seen fit to descend upon us.\n\n'Well, I cannot blame you for Dagbert's foolishness. You meant well.'
Dagbert is at Etheburg in the Brown Lands.\n\nYou should bring news of your victory to Dagbert.
'Uh...good work, [placeholder]. I confess I was not sure I would see you again, but you have proven quite hardy!'
'Uh...good work, [placeholder]. I confess I was not sure I would see you again, but you have proven quite hardy!'
Defeat Khundolar at Lashkarg in the Brown Lands ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Talk to Dagbert in the Brown Lands
Talk to Céola at Etheburg in the Brown Lands
